Our Process

Establish Objectives

We work with clients to set obtainable and specific goals that will help them achieve their business objectives.

1

SWOT Analysis

We analyze your organization's strengths and weaknesses, and the opportunities and threats that you face.

2

Marketing Plan

A strategy is developed that outlines both short-term and long-term activities and decide how they will be implemented.

3

Launch Campaign

The Strategic Marketing Plan is fully implemented and all activities are carried out and taken to market.

4

Measure & Optimize

All activities are measured and the data gathered will serve as a benchmark for optimizing marketing campaigns.

5

Client Testimonials

Social Media Solutions completely redesigned our website and implemented SEO. As a result, the 170% increase in organic traffic yielded 6 leads in the last month alone, 4 of which have already converted to sales.

Outsourcing Company
